title: EAMENA
text:
Arches-powered platform

Full-stackAWSPostgresPython/DjangoElasticApacheUI





an  instance








AWS









an  instance









WAF






Arches is a geospatial semantic graph platform for CH management. It natively integrates Dublin Core, CIDOC-CRM, SKOS and SPARQL. Its next version (v7) will also offer internationalisation, RTL support for the user interface and import/export of multi-language data.

section: Endangered Archaeology in Middle East and North Africa
text:
Endangered Archaeology in Middle East and North Africa

DestructionAgricultureConstructionNatural









Destruction of Palmyre by ISIS in 2016












Udhma (Jordan). The area around one section of the site is completely ploughed, whilst the other half has been destroyed to plant an orchard












This 2013 aerial photograph shows a road over a section of an exposed excavation of the remains of a church in Ma’in, Jordan (APAAME_20130414_MND-0484 Ma’in).












Sabratha in Libya, which is slowly washing away into the sea







Destruction: iconoclasm, looting, etc.
